message.body: Hahaha you two look like a camel
Yeah it looks cool. So where are you staying? I thought Death Valley would be a one-day thing
Death Valley can be a one day thing, but I'd suggest at least 3, and 5 to get the most out of it.
We were in Vegas for 2 days, then Death Valley for 3 and a half.
Going to be in Davis and San Francisco for the next week.
